name: One of These Nights
content: One of these crazy old nights
We're gonna find out pretty mama
And the wicked wind whispers and moans
You got your demons and you got desires
And I got a few of my own
Ooh someone to be calling to
In between the dark and light
One of these lost and lonely dreams now
I've been waiting for a woman
In between the wrong and the right
In between the dark and the light
Get you baby one of these nights
Swear I'm gonna find you now
One of these crazy crazy crazy night
I wanna say ya one of these nights
